name: AMERICAN HOME FURNISHINGS ALLIANCE
description: Trade Associaton of Home Furnishingings Industry
sampleDescriptions: Monitor FY2018 Interior, EPA and Financial Services Appropriations Bills
Monitor Toxic Substances Control Act implementation.
Discuss impacts of scope ruling on anti-dumping orders. Monitor implementations on P.L. 111-199 on import certifications.
Monitor implementation of national formaldehyde standard and Boiler MACT being developed by EPA. Support harmonization with existing California standard. Support HR 4220, SOFFA.
